trans-unit.source: Provides information for the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized"></xref>, <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized"></xref>, and <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized"></xref> events.
trans-unit.target: Gir informasjon om den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized"> </xref>, <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized"> </xref>, og <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized"> </xref> hendelser.

trans-unit.source: A `SpeechRecognized` event is raised by the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> classes.
trans-unit.target: En `SpeechRecognized` denne hendelsen oppstår ved den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>og <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>klasser.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: `SpeechRecognized` events are generated when one or more of the alternates from a recognition operation have a high enough confidence score to be accepted.
trans-unit.target: `SpeechRecognized`hendelser genereres når én eller flere alternativer fra en recognition-operasjon har nok konfidensnivået ligge skal godtas.

trans-unit.source: To obtain detailed information about a recognized phrase, access the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A> property in the handler for the event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha detaljert informasjon om et gjenkjent uttrykk, få tilgang til den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A>egenskap i et behandlingsprogram for hendelsen.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A>
